achievements.title: Introduction to Programming
achievements.description: Began learning programming at age 11, starting with Scratch and progressing to C++ as the first formal programming language.

achievements.title: Proficiency in Multiple Programming Languages
achievements.description: Gained proficiency in Python, C++, JavaScript, Java, and more. Developed skills in logic building, object-oriented programming, memory management, and web development.

achievements.title: Completed Digi Navigator 4
achievements.description: Successfully completed Digi Navigator 4, a UK curriculum-based course focusing on foundational digital literacy and programming skills.

achievements.title: Province-Level Coding Competition Winner
achievements.description: Achieved first place in a province-level coding and animation competition organized by Cannon Secondary School and Digi School in 2025.

achievements.title: Chess Game Project
achievements.description: Developed a fully functional chess game using Python and Pygame, implementing all game logic from scratch without external libraries.

achievements.title: Completed Digi Trailblazer-1
achievements.description: Completed the Trailblazer-1 course, gaining foundational knowledge in Python programming, cybersecurity basics, and introductory IoT concepts.

achievements.title: Machine Learning Project
achievements.description: Created a basic machine learning project capable of recognizing handwritten digits and converting them into digital format, applying fundamental ML techniques.

achievements.title: Full-Stack Web Development Course Creation
achievements.description: Designed and developed a beginner-focused full-stack web development course for the ICT Club at NJBS, emphasizing self-learning and practical application.
